Most Illustrious Sir

Regarding mercury and powders of Joanes, Your Lordship Antônio Manuel Correia da Câmara, at the first opportune occasion, shall send half of each item to the War Train in this capital, in order to satisfy the requisitions made for these drugs by the various overseers of the winter quarters of the state.

God keep Your Lordship. Secretariat of Finance in Caçapava, March 15, 1839. Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima, General Collector of the Municipalities of Alegrete and São Borja. Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic

To the citizen Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima, General Collector of the municipalities of São Borja and Alegrete. From the Ministry of Finance. March 15, 1839. Almeida.
